name: EagleSong
description:
This game is a Ludum Dare 43  COMPO entry and is created in 48 hours!

Goal: kick all other eagles from the nest.

You can play this game alone or with up to 3 other players (Couch-Coop)!

Controls: 

-press 1-4 to activate a eagle to control them by a player.

-you get 3 buttons shown two to turn the direction arrow to the left or right and one to dash forward 

Credits: made by me Planschi!
